data.partBlankContent: Kirby's Adventure is a platform game. The pla___ has t_ get t_ the e__ of ea__ level b_ walking, jumping a__ flying. Each le___ has ene____ and thi___ that g__ in t__ way, but some_____ these thi___ also he__ Kirby. If Kirby touches a_ enemy, he lo___ a hea___ point ( he h__ six ). data.fullContent: Kirby's Adventure is a platform game. The player has to get to the end of each level by walking, jumping and flying. Each level has enemies and things that get in the way, but sometimes these things also help Kirby. If Kirby touches an enemy, he loses a health point ( he has six ). Sometimes Kirby meets a mini-boss, and he must beat it to go on.
data.answer: Kirby的冒险是一款平台游戏。玩家必须通过步行、跳跃和飞行到达每一关的终点。每个关卡都有敌人和阻碍他们的东西，但有时这些东西也会帮助Kirby。如果Kirby碰到敌人，他会失去1点生命值(他有6点生命值)。有时柯比会遇到一个“迷你老板”，他必须打败这个“迷你老板”才能继续工作。
